```pddl
[
  (:action pick ; Pick up an item and place it in a specified location
    :parameters (?item - item ?p - player ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?item ?loc1) (at ?p ?loc1))
    :effect (and (not (at ?item ?loc1)) (at ?item ?loc2))),

  (:action throw ; Throw an item into a container
    :parameters (?item - item ?actor - player ?start_loc - location ?end_loc - location ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?item ?start_loc) (at ?actor ?start_loc) (at ?container ?end_loc))
    :effect (and (not (at ?item ?start_loc)) (in ?item ?container))),

  (:action dust ; Perform cleaning tasks in a location
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - item ?room - location ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?room) (or (full ?container) (and (at ?item ?room) (contains ?item ?container))))
    :effect (and (or (clean ?room) (clean ?item)))),

  (:action shake ; Shake an item to transform its state
    :parameters (?actor - player ?item - item ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (at ?item ?location) (not (clean ?item)))
    :effect (clean ?item)),

  (:action enjoy ; Enjoy a resource or state and update personal satisfaction
    :parameters (?p - player ?resource - item)
    :precondition (at ?p ?resource)
    :effect (happy ?p))
]
```
